resources.string: Where Did I Park The Car?

Written by Jentry Maxwell and David Baker 


CGCC CIS165 Final Class Project, Spring 2019 

 Version 17

Thank you for choosing this app! 

To Get Started 
Click Continue on the initial screen and a map displaying your current location will appear (it may take a few moments as GPS signals are acquired). 

Simply click Current Location when you have parked your car to remember this location. 

 Click Navigate and we will show you how to return.
